attributes.action: to take measures concerning a political support of the opposition in Ukraine
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Formation of democracy in Eastern Europe, in particular, in Ukraine, is 
an important stage in development of a contemporary Europe political 
history. In this connection, facts of economical pursuit of principal 
sponsors of a Ukrainian opposition raise great concern. We would like to 
draw your attention at the fact that Kharkiv AVEC concern owned by 
leader of Jewish Community in Ukraine, human rights defender and Verkhovna 
Rada deputy Alexander Feldman, suffers from economical repressions. His 
business is being attacked for Feldman’s being a supporter of 
oppositional bloc of Yulia Tymoshenko. By means of pre-conceived 
revisions and repressions Kharkiv’s authorities endeavor to establish a 
tendency of economical pursues of political opponents in Ukraine. We 
appeal to the Prime Minister to take measures concerning a political 
support of the opposition in Ukraine as well as defense of democratic 
institutions and human rights in our country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
